docs.snippet: Parisians return to bars and restaurants to show their defiance of last week's attacks that killed 129 people. Diane Hodges reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: Parisians return to bars and restaurants to show their defiance of last week's attacks that killed 129 people. Diane Hodges reports.

headline.main: France's Air Liquide to Buy U.S. Peer Airgas in $13.4 Billion Deal
headline.print_headline: France's Air Liquide to Buy U.S. Peer Airgas in $13.4 Billion Deal

docs.snippet: France's Air Liquide said on Tuesday it will buy U.S. peer Airgas Inc in a $13.4 billion (8.8 billion pounds) deal including debt that will boost its footprint in the U.S. market, the world's top industrial gases market....
docs.lead_paragraph: France's Air Liquide said on Tuesday it will buy U.S. peer Airgas Inc in a $13.4 billion (8.8 billion pounds) deal including debt that will boost its footprint in the U.S. market, the world's top industrial gases market.

headline.main: Ex-New York Senate Leader Corruptly Helped Son Get Paid, Jury Told
headline.print_headline: Ex-New York Senate Leader Corruptly Helped Son Get Paid, Jury Told

docs.snippet: A former leader of the New York state Senate strong-armed three companies to pay his son over $300,000, knowing that his position to influence policy crucial to their businesses meant "they couldn't say no," a federal prosecutor said on Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A former leader of the New York state Senate strong-armed three companies to pay his son over $300,000, knowing that his position to influence policy crucial to their businesses meant "they couldn't say no," a federal prosecutor said on Tuesday.

headline.main: Poland's Youngsters Shine in 3-1 Win Over Czechs
headline.print_headline: Poland's Youngsters Shine in 3-1 Win Over Czechs

docs.snippet: An experimental Poland side beat the Czech Republic 3-1 in a friendly international on Tuesday as they tested their younger players in preparation for Euro 2016.  ...
docs.lead_paragraph: An experimental Poland side beat the Czech Republic 3-1 in a friendly international on Tuesday as they tested their younger players in preparation for Euro 2016.

headline.main: Door Still Open for Russia to Compete in Rio Athletics
headline.print_headline: Door Still Open for Russia to Compete in Rio Athletics

docs.snippet: Russia still has a shot to compete in the athletics competition at the 2016 Olympics if they can prove they are drug free, the head of a probe into the country's doping scandal said on Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Russia still has a shot to compete in the athletics competition at the 2016 Olympics if they can prove they are drug free, the head of a probe into the country's doping scandal said on Tuesday.

headline.main: Lacklustre Italy Held at Home by Stubborn Romania
headline.print_headline: Lacklustre Italy Held at Home by Stubborn Romania

docs.snippet: Italy conceded a late goal to draw 2-2 with Romania in an international friendly on Tuesday, as doubts remained about their title-winning credentials ahead of Euro 2016....
docs.lead_paragraph: Italy conceded a late goal to draw 2-2 with Romania in an international friendly on Tuesday, as doubts remained about their title-winning credentials ahead of Euro 2016.

headline.main: Paris Attack May Add Firepower to U.S. Defense Stocks
headline.print_headline: Paris Attack May Add Firepower to U.S. Defense Stocks

docs.snippet: U.S. defense stocks, already on the upswing following the recent budget deal, are expected to rise further if the Paris attack gives a fillip to rising international sales....
docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. defense stocks, already on the upswing following the recent budget deal, are expected to rise further if the Paris attack gives a fillip to rising international sales.
